nodes.text: The AD-4 Battledroid Centurion was a type of battle droid used as security forces by the Selkath species on the planet Manaan during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. A number of AD-4 Centurions were among the security forces of Genetics Laboratory G-1, a genetic research facility on Manaan.

The AD-4 Battledroid Centurion appears as an enemy in the Tactical Flashpoint "Depths of Manaan," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.9: Galactic Strongholds Early Access. Strangely, the droids are only named in the standard version of the Flashpoint; in the Solo Mode, they are simply titled "Battledroid Centurion."
